name: GAP (AronEiichi)
description:
Controls:

Mouse and Keyboard:

WASD - Movement / Jump

Mouse - Aim (Must have circle over corpse to pick it up)

Click - Pick up Corpse / Throw Corpse

Controller:

Left thumbstick - Movement

Right thumbstick - Aim (Must have circle over corpse to pick it up)

L1 - Jump

R1 - Pick up Corpse / Throw Corpse
